title: ollama/ollama
summary: The official Ollama project: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama, published on npm as ‘ollama’.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama, published on PyPI as ‘ollama’.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package that adds Ollama as a local LLM backend.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for chatting with any Ollama model (formerly Ollama-WebUI).

title: ollama-cli
summary: A Go CLI that wraps Ollama with prompt templates and conversation history.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns Ollama models into a local GitHub Copilot.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community-maintained Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client library for Ollama, published to Maven Central.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem for interacting with the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset, exposing Ollama as a Generator and Embedder.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that streams Ollama model responses in chat.

title: ollama-ex
summary: Elixir library for Ollama with GenServer-backed process management.

title: ollama-n8n-node
summary: Community node for n8n that enables local LLM workflows via Ollama.

title: ollama-dagger-module
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama containers in CI pipelines for testing.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing async bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama with strongly-typed request/response models.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds local AI autocomplete and summarization via Ollama.
